𓁶 𓏤 𓇔 | ⲣⲏⲥ "south" raš

𒊕 raš ratio (head)

𒊕 rēšu (SAG) ⇔ rede=sage
𒊕 RIŠ راس rās 𐤓𐤀𐤔
𒊕 Rassel ⇔ reason ration
𒊑𒅆 re-ši ratio •reiki : head 𒊕 rēšu •risaĝi

𓂋𓎡𓄯ration

𓂋 ⲣⲱ⳼ round rad ⇔ Fresse (vulgar)
𓁶 proto
𓄂 head ⇔ heart
𓁷 hr(s) qér vs 𓁷 reb in 𓁷 𓄣 ≈ 𒆠𒆗 qé-reb coreb

𐀪 in 𐀪-𐀍 ri-jo rasi (Swahili) رَأْس raʾs cape raš
